data.field:
About the PerlMonks FAQ

Note: This page used to contain the PerlMonks FAQ Index. It has been superceded by the [PerlMonks FAQ].

The [PerlMonks FAQ] is an organized collection of documents which serve as the user manual for the entire site.

Maintenance of the [PerlMonks FAQ] is the responsibility of the [SiteDocClan] (one of the officially sanctioned PerlMonks [id://238736|orders]). For details on what they do, see [id://20981]

To suggest improvements to the site documentation, simply [/msg] [SiteDocClan].

History of the PerlMonks FAQ:

Current: [483072]
Previous: [237040] (now the meta-FAQ)
Old: [42269]
Ancient: [17316]
Original: [9953]
Back to the [PerlMonks FAQ]
